Description:
Detects specific commands commonly used to remove or empty the syslog

Author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Commands to Clear or Remove the Syslog - Builtin
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((log like '%rm /var/log/syslog%' or log like '%rm -r /var/log/syslog%' or log like '%rm -f /var/log/syslog%' or log like '%rm -rf /var/log/syslog%' or log like '%mv /var/log/syslog%' or log like '% >/var/log/syslog%' or log like '% > /var/log/syslog%') and  not log like '%/syslog.%')
